short_description: Escape to the tropical paradise of The Bahamas, an archipelago of over 700 islands and cays in the Caribbean. Experience pristine white-sand beaches, crystal-clear turquoise waters, world-class diving, vibrant Junkanoo culture, and luxurious resorts in this island nation.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores
US Dollar is widely accepted alongside the Bahamian Dollar

tipping.hotels: Tipping is appreciated for porters ($1-2 per bag) and housekeeping ($2-5 per day)
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 15-20% tip is customary for good service, though some restaurants may include a service charge

weather.title: The Bahamas has a tropical savanna climate with warm temperatures year-round. The dry season runs from December to April, while the wet season is from May to November, with the highest chance of hurricanes from August to October.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Perfect weather with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and warm temperatures. This is the peak tourist season, ideal for beach activities, water sports, diving, and outdoor adventures. Best time for snorkeling and exploring the islands

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures with occasional brief showers. Fewer crowds and lower prices make this a great time to visit. Still excellent weather for beach activities, water sports, and exploring the islands

when_to_visit.title: Junkanoo Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Experience the vibrant Junkanoo festival with colorful parades, music, and cultural celebrations. Peak tourist season with perfect weather, but expect higher prices and more crowds

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and more frequent rain showers, with peak hurricane season in September and October. Lower prices and fewer tourists, but be aware of weather conditions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit The Bahamas is during the dry season from December to April when the weather is perfect with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and ideal conditions for beach activities, water sports, and outdoor adventures
